title: Login Error - The Login Server Did Not Respond
body:
OCE (Others are fine) Login servers appear to be unresponsive, I've tried over multiple connections with no success.

Server status page still says everything is fine, so I think that's broken too. ;)

LOL has become a necessity of life, much like food and water, please fix before angry gamer nerds begin to take showers, go outside and talk to people IRL!

replies.body:
Hey jorglukas,

Riot is aware of the issue and is working to resolve it as soon as possible. Check out the announcement by Agent Mindstar below:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/kbVzswc0-login-issues-4th-feb-2016
